bill.title: Educational technology infrastructure upgrades; provide certain funding sources for school districts.
bill.description: An Act Relating To Public Education Finance; To Amend Section 37-151-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize School Districts To Issue State Aid Educational Technology Improvement Bonds And To Provide The Amount The School Districts May Pledge From Adequate Education Program Funds For Repayment Of The Bonds And Earmark These Proceeds For Educational Technology Infrastructure Upgrades, Electronic Textbooks And Technology Hardware; To Amend Section 37-59-101, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize School Districts To Issue Short-term Notes For Educational Technology Infrastructure Upgrades, Electronic Textbooks And Technology Hardware; To Amend Section 37-59-107, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Ad Valorem Tax Limitation On Short-term Notes; To Amend Section 37-43-41, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The State Textbook Fund May Be Utilized By School Districts For The Purchase Of Educational Technology Infrastructure Upgrades, Electronic Textbooks And Technology Hardware; To Amend Section 37-61-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Increased Sales Tax Collections From Internet Sales Shall Be Deposited Into The Education Enhancement Fund And Earmarked For Educational Technology Infrastructure Upgrades, Electronic Textbooks And Technology Hardware; To Amend Section 27-67-4, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The Collection Of Taxes On Internet Sales; And For Related Purposes.
